shredindex.app.TITLE: Shred Index
shredindex.app.SUBTITLE: Live your best adventure lifestyle
shredindex.filterdescription.DIGITAL_NOM: Check the suitability for a location-savvy digital nomad life.
shredindex.filterdescription.SEASONAL_WO: Find out how great a place is for seasonal work opportunities.
shredindex.filterdescription.FAMILY_VACA: Discover how family-friendly and fun-filled a place can be.
shredindex.filterdescription.AFFORDABILI: Determine if your pocket approves of this location.
shredindex.filterdescription.MONEY_SAVIN: See if this place allows you to save or spend.
shredindex.filterdescription.SNOW_QUALIT: Evaluate the greatness of the powdery white stuff.
shredindex.filterdescription.BACKCOUNTRY: Know how easy it is to wander off the beaten path.
shredindex.filterdescription.SLACKCOUNTR: Find out about the access to non-patrolled, lift-accessed areas.
shredindex.filterdescription.NEARBY_VEHI: Identify the ease of reaching ski resorts by vehicle.
shredindex.filterdescription.AVALANCHE_S: Confirm the safety standards for avalanches.
shredindex.filterdescription.FRESH_TRACK: Measure the possibility of finding untracked snow.
shredindex.filterdescription.LIFT_ACCESS: Review the quality and capacity of ski lifts.
shredindex.filterdescription.SKI_IN_SKI_: Asses the convenience of skiing right from your doorstep.
shredindex.filterdescription.UNCROWDED: Understand how crowded or peaceful a place is.
shredindex.filterdescription.EXPERT_TERR: Identify venues offering advanced skill level terrain.
shredindex.filterdescription.TERRAIN_PAR: Discover the availability of terrain parks for freestyle skiing & snowboarding.
shredindex.filterdescription.CHILD_FRIEN: Explore how child-friendly the venue is.
shredindex.filterdescription.LIVABILITY: Check out the overall living conditions.
shredindex.filterdescription.HOUSING_AVA: Find the availability of housing options.
shredindex.filterdescription.JOB_AVAILAB: Investigate the availability of job opportunities
shredindex.filterdescription.SUMMER_ACTI: Explore the range of summer fun at the venue.
shredindex.filterdescription.ENGLISH_LEV: Consider local English proficiency levels at a place.
shredindex.filterdescription.LOCAL_LANGU: Identify venues where local language proficiency isn't vital.
shredindex.filterdescription.LGBT_FRIEND: Check out how friendly and accepting the local vibe is.
shredindex.filterdescription.CANNABIS_FR: Look for venues that are 420 friendly.
shredindex.filterdescription.INTERNATION: Understand the international diversity in a place.
shredindex.filterdescription.GENDER_RATI: Investigate the gender distribution in the area.
shredindex.filterdescription.POSITIVE_VI: Check out the positive vibes and atmospheres.
shredindex.filterdescription.CAMPER_FRIE: Find out how camper-friendly the place is.
shredindex.filterdescription.APRÈS: Explore the après-ski scene at the location.
shredindex.filterdescription.NIGHT_LIFE: Delve into the nightlife experience at the location.
shredindex.filterdescription.CO_WORKING_: Discover the availability and standards of co-working spaces.
shredindex.filterdescription.CONNECTIVIT: Review the connectivity and internet speed at a place.
shredindex.filterdescription.CAFES_TO_WO: Discover great coffee shops with work-friendly environment.
shredindex.filterdescription.CO_WORKING_: Find out about the co-working culture and work-life balance here.
shredindex.filterdescription.ELEVATION_P: Discover the peak that you can ski from.
shredindex.filterdescription.NUMBER_OF_R: Count the variety and number of ski runs.
shredindex.filterdescription.NUMBER_OF_L: Discover the number and variety of lifts available.
shredindex.filterdescription.SKIABLE_TER: Know the extent of terrain you can ski on.
shredindex.filterdescription.VERTICAL_DR: Discover how much you'll be descending on your runs.
shredindex.filterdescription.LONGEST_RUN: Find out about the length of the longest ski run.
shredindex.filterdescription.TERRAIN_EXP: Know the proportion of terrain for expert level skiers.
shredindex.filterdescription.TERRAIN_INT: Know the proportion of terrain for intermediate level skiers.
shredindex.filterdescription.TERRAIN_BEG: Know the proportion of terrain for beginner level skiers.
shredindex.filterdescription.SNOW_MAKING: Identify the presence and quality of artificial snow making.
shredindex.filterdescription.HAS_CROSS_C: Discover if there are options for cross-country skiing.
shredindex.filterdescription.NIGHT_SKIIN: Check if you can also enjoy the slopes at night.
